title: Worries about Pope Francis have spread around the world -- a parishioner prays for the pontiff's health at the Basilica of Suyapa in Tegucigalpa | National | ktbs.com
text:
Tags
As featured on
Pope Francis followed Sunday mass and his traditional Angelus weekly prayer on television in a Rome hospital where the 88-year-old pontiff is being treated for bronchitis.
